pages.text: There used to be a Ronin, wandering around the world.$(br)Someone accidentally saw the instant when he was unsheathing his Blade in a desert.$(br2)The Sharpness of the Blade and its sparks' blasting amazed the witness, and the Blade was imitated imprudently.$(br2)However, no one knows where the Ronin and its Blade is now...
